languages.text: Собрав по пути группу техноматов и рабочих с лазерными резаками, Лорд-капитан добирается до средних палуб. Бронированные двери отделяют тысячи людей без света, связи и кислорода от остального корабля. Взмах руки Вольного Торговца — и резак начинает работу. Через десять минут листы металла с грохотом падают, и поток изможденных людей выливается из смертельной ловушки в коридоры, славя Трон, Лорд-капитана и все что свято.

traits.locale_text: Лорд-капитан с группой инженеров и промышленным лазерным резаком добирается до средних палуб. Бронированные двери отделяют тысячи людей без света, связи и кислорода от остального корабля. Взмах руки капитана — и резак начинает работу. Через десять минут листы металла с грохотом падают, и поток изможденных людей выливается из отсека в коридоры.

languages.text: Gathering a group of technomats and workers with plasma cutters along the way, the Lord Captain reaches the middle decks. Armoured doors separate thousands of people from the rest of the ship, people who have been robbed of light, communication, and oxygen. A wave of the Rogue Trader's hand — and the cutter gets to work. Ten minutes later, sheets of metal come down with a crash, and a stream of haggard-looking people pours out of the death trap and into the passageways, praising the Throne, the Lord Captain, and all that is holy.
languages.original_text: Собрав по пути группу техноматов и рабочих с лазерными резаками, Лорд-капитан добирается до средних палуб. Бронированные двери отделяют тысячи людей без света, связи и кислорода от остального корабля. Взмах руки Вольного Торговца — и резак начинает работу. Через десять минут листы металла с грохотом падают, и поток изможденных людей выливается из смертельной ловушки в коридоры, славя Трон, Лорд-капитана и все что свято.

traits.locale_text: Having gathered a group of technomats and workers with laser cutters along the way, the Lord Captain reaches the middle decks. Armored doors separate thousands of people from the rest of the ship, people who have been robbed of light, communication, and oxygen. A wave of the Rogue Trader's hand — and the cutter does its job. Ten minutes later, sheets of metal come down with a crash, and a stream of haggard-looking people pours out of the deathtrap and into the corridors, praising the Throne, the Lord Captain, and all that is holy.

A wave of the Rogue Trader's hand — and the cutter gets to work. Ten minutes later, sheets of metal come down with a crash, and a stream of haggard-looking people pours out of the death trap and into the passageways, praising the Throne, the Lord Captain, and all that is holy.

Armoured doors separate thousands of people from the rest of the ship, people who have been robbed of light, communication, and oxygen. A wave of the Rogue Trader's hand — and the cutter gets to work. Ten minutes later, sheets of metal come down with a crash, and a stream of haggard-looking people pours out of the death trap and into the passageways, praising the Throne, the Lord Captain, and all that is holy.

Gathering a group of technomats and workers with plasma cutters along the way, the Lord Captain reaches the middle decks. Armoured doors separate thousands of people from the rest of the ship, people who have been robbed of light, communication, and oxygen. A wave of the Rogue Trader's hand — and the cutter gets to work. Ten minutes later, sheets of metal come down with a crash, and a stream of haggard-looking people pours out of the death trap and into the passageways, praising the Throne, the Lord Captain, and all that is holy.

languages.text: {mf|El|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} reúne a un grupo de tecnómatas y trabajadores con sopletes de plasma y llega a las cubiertas intermedias. Una serie de puertas blindadas separa a miles de personas del resto de la nave, privándolas de luz, comunicación y oxígeno. Con un gesto, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente da la orden de activar el soplete. Tan solo diez minutos después, las placas de metal caen con un gran estruendo y la gente sale de la trampa mortal alabando al Trono, a{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} y a todo lo que es sagrado.
languages.original_text: Gathering a group of technomats and workers with plasma cutters along the way, the Lord Captain reaches the middle decks. Armoured doors separate thousands of people from the rest of the ship, people who have been robbed of light, communication, and oxygen. A wave of the Rogue Trader's hand — and the cutter gets to work. Ten minutes later, sheets of metal come down with a crash, and a stream of haggard-looking people pours out of the death trap and into the passageways, praising the Throne, the Lord Captain, and all that is holy.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} reúne a un grupo de tecnómatas y trabajadores con sopletes de plasma y llega a las cubiertas intermedias. Una serie de puertas blindadas separa a miles de personas del resto de la nave, privándolas de luz, comunicación y oxígeno. Con un gesto, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente da la orden de activar el soplete. Tan solo diez minutos después, las placas de metal caen con un gran estruendo y la gente sale de la trampa mortal alabando al Trono, a{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} y a todo lo que es sagrado.

languages.text: 领主舰长一路上召集了一群技工与携带等离子切割器的工人，抵达了中层甲板。甲板的装甲门后面困着数以千计的船员。这些人身处黑暗之中，无法收到任何通讯，氧气也即将耗尽。行商浪人大手一挥，等离子切割器开始工作。十分钟后，金属大门轰然倒塌，一群面色枯槁的人从死亡陷阱中涌了出来。他们争相冲进通道，赞美黄金王座、领主舰长，以及其他一切神圣的事物。
languages.original_text: Gathering a group of technomats and workers with plasma cutters along the way, the Lord Captain reaches the middle decks. Armoured doors separate thousands of people from the rest of the ship, people who have been robbed of light, communication, and oxygen. A wave of the Rogue Trader's hand — and the cutter gets to work. Ten minutes later, sheets of metal come down with a crash, and a stream of haggard-looking people pours out of the death trap and into the passageways, praising the Throne, the Lord Captain, and all that is holy.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长一路上召集了一群机械殉道者与携带等离子切割器的工人，抵达了中层甲板。甲板的装甲门后面困着数以千计的船员。这些人身处黑暗之中，无法收到任何通讯，氧气也即将耗尽。行商浪人大手一挥，等离子切割器开始工作。十分钟后，金属大门轰然倒塌，一群面色枯槁的人从死亡陷阱中涌了出来。他们争相冲进通道，赞美黄金王座、领主舰长，以及其他一切神圣的事物。

languages.text: 途中でテクノマットとプラズマカッターを持った作業員のグループを集め、ロード・キャプテンは中層デッキに到着した。がっしりと頑丈な扉が数千人の人間から光、会話、酸素を奪い、船のこちら側と隔てている。自由開拓者が手を振ると、カッターが動き始めた。10分後、金属板が音を立てて落ちるとやつれた人々が死の罠から逃れて通路に流れ込み、王座を、ロード・キャプテンを、そしてすべての神聖なるものを称えた。
languages.original_text: Gathering a group of technomats and workers with plasma cutters along the way, the Lord Captain reaches the middle decks. Armoured doors separate thousands of people from the rest of the ship, people who have been robbed of light, communication, and oxygen. A wave of the Rogue Trader's hand — and the cutter gets to work. Ten minutes later, sheets of metal come down with a crash, and a stream of haggard-looking people pours out of the death trap and into the passageways, praising the Throne, the Lord Captain, and all that is holy.

traits.locale_text: 途中でテクノマットとプラズマカッターを持った作業員のグループを集め、ロード・キャプテンは中層デッキに到着した。がっしりと頑丈な扉が数千人の人間から光、会話、酸素を奪い、船のこちら側と隔てている。自由開拓者が手を振ると、カッターが動き始めた。10分後、金属板が音を立てて落ちるとやつれた人々が死の罠から逃れて通路に流れ込み、王座を、ロード・キャプテンを、そしてすべての神聖なるものを称えた。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain schart eine Gruppe von Technomaten und Arbeitern mit Plasmaschneidern um sich und erreicht die mittleren Decks. Gepanzerte Türen trennen Tausende von Menschen vom Rest des Schiffes ab, Menschen, die des Lichts, der Kommunikation und des Sauerstoffs beraubt wurden. Eine Handbewegung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} und der Cutter macht sich an die Arbeit. Zehn Minuten später fallen mit einem Krachen Metallplatten herunter, und ein Strom hagerer Menschen strömt aus der Todesfalle in die Gänge und preist den Thron, den Lord Captain und alles, was heilig ist.
languages.original_text: Gathering a group of technomats and workers with plasma cutters along the way, the Lord Captain reaches the middle decks. Armoured doors separate thousands of people from the rest of the ship, people who have been robbed of light, communication, and oxygen. A wave of the Rogue Trader's hand — and the cutter gets to work. Ten minutes later, sheets of metal come down with a crash, and a stream of haggard-looking people pours out of the death trap and into the passageways, praising the Throne, the Lord Captain, and all that is holy.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} arrive aux ponts intermédiaires avec un groupe de technomates et d'ouvriers équipés de découpeurs à plasma qu'{mf|il|elle} a rassemblés en chemin. Des milliers de personnes sont actuellement privées de lumière, de communication et d'oxygène, séparées du reste du vaisseau par des portes blindées. D'un geste de la main, {name} indique aux ouvriers de se mettre au travail. Dix minutes plus tard, les pans de métal s'effondrent avec fracas, et un flot d'individus exténués émerge du piège mortel en bénissant le Trône, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} et tous les saints.
languages.original_text: Gathering a group of technomats and workers with plasma cutters along the way, the Lord Captain reaches the middle decks. Armoured doors separate thousands of people from the rest of the ship, people who have been robbed of light, communication, and oxygen. A wave of the Rogue Trader's hand — and the cutter gets to work. Ten minutes later, sheets of metal come down with a crash, and a stream of haggard-looking people pours out of the death trap and into the passageways, praising the Throne, the Lord Captain, and all that is holy.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} arrive aux ponts intermédiaires avec un groupe de technomates et d'ouvriers équipés de découpeurs à plasma qu'{mf|il|elle} a rassemblés en chemin. Des milliers de personnes sont actuellement privées de lumière, de communication et d'oxygène, séparées du reste du vaisseau par des portes blindées. D'un geste de la main, {name} indique aux ouvriers de se mettre au travail. Dix minutes plus tard, les pans de métal s'effondrent avec fracas, et un flot d'individus exténués émerge du piège mortel en bénissant le Trône, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} et tous les saints.

languages.text: Yolda bir grup teknomat ve plazma kesiciye sahip işçi toplayan Lord Kaptan, orta güvertelere ulaşıyor. Burada zırhlı kapılar; ışık, iletişim ve oksijeni çalınan binlerce insanı geminin geri kalanından ayırıyor. Hür Tacir'in işaretiyle kesiciler işe koyuluyor. On dakika sonra metal levhalar gürültüyle yere devriliyor ve ölüm tuzağından geçitlere dökülen dermansız bir insan seli; Taht'a, Lord Kaptan'a ve tüm kutsallara övgüler yağdırıyor.
languages.original_text: Gathering a group of technomats and workers with plasma cutters along the way, the Lord Captain reaches the middle decks. Armoured doors separate thousands of people from the rest of the ship, people who have been robbed of light, communication, and oxygen. A wave of the Rogue Trader's hand — and the cutter gets to work. Ten minutes later, sheets of metal come down with a crash, and a stream of haggard-looking people pours out of the death trap and into the passageways, praising the Throne, the Lord Captain, and all that is holy.

traits.locale_text: Yol boyunca bir grup teknomaton ve plazma kesiciye sahip işçi toplayan Lord Kaptan, orta güvertelere ulaşıyor. Geminin geri kalanı ile ışık, iletişim ve oksijeni çalınan binlerce insan zırhlı kapılarla ayrılıyor. Hür Tacir'in işaretiyle kesiciler işe koyuluyor. On dakika sonra metal levhalar gürültüyle yere devriliyor ve ölüm tuzağından geçitlere dökülen dermansız bir insan seli; Taht'a, Lord Kaptan'a ve tüm kutsallara övgüler yağdırıyor.
